data.name: Lockdown!
data.descr: Defeat Xevozz, Lavanthor, Ichoron, Zuramat the Obliterator, Erekem, and Moragg in The Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty.
data.tooltip:
Lockdown!

Defeat Xevozz, Lavanthor, Ichoron, Zuramat the Obliterator, Erekem, and Moragg in The Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty.

Criteria:
- Xevozz
- Ichoron
- Erekem
- Lavanthor
- Zuramat the Obliterator
- Moragg

quests.name: Containment
quests.tooltip:
ContainmentLevel 77

Warden Alturas wants you to enter the Violet Hold and put and end to the blue dragon invasion force. You are to report back to him once Cyanigosa is slain.

Requirements:
- Cyanigosa Slain
